name: Xibalba (itch)
description:
Zipped Unity Project with exe in folder

Controls WASD move, Mouse look, Spacebar jump, L-Shift sprint, L-Control slide, R to restart level

"Xibalba, God of Punishment, is inflicting punishment for Sam, Archeologist, for waking her spirit. Reach the portals to escape and gain freedom!

Man running through gauntlet of traps and obstacles to reach portal to next area. Animations and assets give humor to Deaths and Cut Scenes. After each death you learn from Camera Kill Cam to better odds of next life."
